Title: Increases the cap on the credit for contributions to certain funds for contributions to the SUNY Impact Foundation to twenty million dollars
Summary: Increases the cap on the credit for contributions to certain funds for contributions to the SUNY Impact Foundation from ten million dollars to twenty million dollars.
LawCode: Amd Part LL ยง3, Chap 59 of 2018
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part LL of chapter 59 of the laws of 2018 amending the state finance law relating to establishing the charitable gifts trust fund and the health charitable account, and the elementary and secondary education charitable account, in relation to increasing the contribution cap to twenty million dollars
